about_the_game:
The DCS: World War II Assets Pack provides numerous World War II air, land and sea assets to populate the Normandy and other DCS World maps with. Eagle Dynamics has spent several years creating an entirely new set of combat vehicles to support DCS: World War II, and each unit is created with an exceptional level of detail and accuracy.

In addition to populating World War II era maps, this asset pack can be used with all other DCS World map modules.

Please note that this DLC uses Steam Keys instead of Starforce keys. As such, this purchase cannot be activated on the DCS World e-Shop version.

Soldiers
Ger soldier
US soldier
UK soldier

A-20 Boston - Free
Ju-88A-4
B-17G

Mk VIII Cromwell

Free assets are included with the download of DCS. The DCS: World War II Assets Pack will continue to grow with DCS: Combined Arms compatibility and free asset additions.
detailed_description:
The DCS: World War II Assets Pack provides numerous World War II air, land and sea assets to populate the Normandy and other DCS World maps with. Eagle Dynamics has spent several years creating an entirely new set of combat vehicles to support DCS: World War II, and each unit is created with an exceptional level of detail and accuracy.

In addition to populating World War II era maps, this asset pack can be used with all other DCS World map modules.

Please note that this DLC uses Steam Keys instead of Starforce keys. As such, this purchase cannot be activated on the DCS World e-Shop version.

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: DCS: World War II Assets Pack - $29.99

package_groups.title: Buy DCS: World War II Assets Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 2 cores or more
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • DLC size: 6.84GB
  • Input: Keyboard / Mouse / Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 6 cores or more
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • DLC size: 6.84GB
  • Input: Joystick / Pedals / VR / Track IR / Haptic Gloves

short_description: The DCS: World War II Assets Pack provides numerous World War II air, land and sea assets to populate the Normandy and other DCS World maps with. Eagle Dynamics has spent several years creating an entirely new set of combat vehicles to support DCS: World War II, and each unit is created with an exceptional level of detail and accuracy.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, French, Simplified Chinese, Italian
*languages with full audio support
